data.title: Abigail Spencer
data.text:
AKA Abigail Leigh Spencer

Born: 4-Aug-1981

Birthplace: Gulf Breeze, FL

Gender: Female

Race or Ethnicity: White

Sexual orientation: Straight

Occupation: Actor

Nationality: United States

Executive summary: Cowboys & Aliens

Brother: Yanci

Brother: Sterlin

Husband: Andrew Pruett (m. 2004, filed for div., one son)

Son: Roman (b. 19-Sep-2008)

High School: Gulf Breeze High School, Gulf Breeze, FL
